statements: SELECT * FROM medical_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_inventory WHERE manufacturer='ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT item_id, item_name, expiration_date FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM medical_inventory;
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_inventory WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharma' AND expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity AS total_quantity FROM medical_inventory WHERE expiration_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM medicaljsoninventory GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_items > 5;
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date > CURDATE();
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE condition = 'Good';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, expiration_date FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE condition = 'Good' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND category = 'Tools';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Supply;
SELECT supply_name, manufacturer, quantity FROM Supply WHERE quantity < 20 ORDER BY supply_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM MedicalEquipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, condition FROM MedicalEquipment WHERE condition = 'Good' ORDER BY equipment_name;
SELECT facility_name, location, contact_number FROM HealthFacilities WHERE location LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, condition FROM MedicalEquipment WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM InventoryLogs WHERE operation_type = 'RESTOCK' AND table_name = 'MedicalSupplies' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT facility_name, location, contact_number FROM HealthFacilities WHERE location LIKE '%Hospital%'
SELECT supply_name AS `Supply Name`, quantity AS `Quantity in Stock` FROM MedicalSupplies
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Inc%';
SELECT clinic_name, order_date FROM clinics WHERE clinic_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Main Street%' ORDER BY quantity ASC, item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory JOIN suppliers ON inventory.item_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE suppliers.address LIKE '%Avenue%' AND suppliers.phone_number = '123456789';
SELECT clinic_name, phone_number FROM clinics WHERE clinic_id IN (SELECT clinic_id FROM orders WHERE item_id = 1) ORDER BY clinic_name ASC;

SELECT shipments.shipment_id, suppliers.supplier_name, inventory.item_name, shipments.quantity, shipments.shipment_date FROM shipments JOIN suppliers ON shipments.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id JOIN inventory ON shipments.item_id = inventory.item_id;
